nodes.documentation:
@title A contract that is able to facilitate donations to different charities
 whenever a user wants to make a transfer of funds to another user.
nodes.name: Charitable

nodes.documentation: @param addresses_ The list of charity addresses to store in order to send donations to.

params.addresses_: The list of charity addresses to store in order to send donations to.

params.charityIndex: The target index of the charity to send the 10% of the funds.
params.destinationAddress: The target address to send fund to.

params.charityIndex: The target index of the charity to send the specified amount.
params.destinationAddress: The target address to send fund to.
params.donationAmount: The amount to send to the target charity.

devdoc.title: A contract that is able to facilitate donations to different charities whenever a user wants to make a transfer of funds to another user.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Redirects 10% of the total transferred funds to the target charity and transfers the rest to the target address. Whenever a transfer of funds is complete, it emits the event `Donation`.

deposit(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Redirects the specified amount to the target charity and transfers the rest to the target address. Whenever a transfer of funds is complete, it emits the event `Donation`.

getAddresses().notice: Returns all the available charity addresses.

getHighestDonation().notice: Returns the address that made the highest donation, along with the amount donated.

getTotalDonationsAmount().notice: Returns the total amount raised by all donations (in wei) towards any charity.
